metadata.title: CVE-2014-125021 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in FFmpeg 2.0 and classified as problematic. Thisissue affects the function cmv_process_header. The manipulation leads tomemory corruption. The attack may be initiated remotely. It is recommendedto apply a patch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
